Package com.techelevator.tenmo.services

Class TransferService

java.lang.Object
com.techelevator.tenmo.services.TransferService
public class TransferService extends Object
This class's APIs contain details necessary for retrieving data from the Account table and securely passing it to the View.
Author:
Jayden Southworth, Kadeam Howell

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TransferService(String baseUrl)
    This constructor is used to initialize the REST template and pass the server's URL and the specified endpoint to subsequent APIs.

    void
    createTransfer(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, Transfer trans)
    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, passes the token to a new Entity which contains the passed-in transfer, and then POSTs the authenticated transfer to the database.

    This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns all the logged-in user's transfer records.

  • Constructor Details

    • TransferService

      public TransferService(String baseUrl)
      This constructor is used to initialize the REST template and pass the server's URL and the specified endpoint to subsequent APIs.

  • Method Details

    • createTransfer

      public void createTransfer(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, Transfer trans)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, passes the token to a new Entity which contains the passed-in transfer, and then POSTs the authenticated transfer to the database.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the authentication token.
      trans - Takes a passed-in transfer, and is then stored in an Entity.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.

    • getTransfersFromUserId

      public Transfer[] getTransfersFromUserId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int userId)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns transfers associated with the user's ID.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the authentication token.
      userId - Takes a passed-in user ID and then appends it to the endpoint.
      Returns:
      all transfers associated with a user's ID.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.

    • getTransferFromId

      public Transfer getTransferFromId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int id)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns a transfer based on the passed-in transfer ID.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the authentication token.
      id - Takes a passed-in transfer ID and then appends it to the endpoint.
      Returns:
      the transfer associated with the specified ID.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.

    • getAllTransfers

      public Transfer[] getAllTransfers(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns all the logged-in user's transfer records.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the authentication token.
      Returns:
      all the logged-in user's transfer records.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.

    • getPendingTransfersByUserId

      public Transfer[] getPendingTransfersByUserId(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, int id)
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then returns all the current user's pending transfers based on the user's ID.
      Parameters:
      authenticatedUser - Retrieves the authentication token.
      id - Takes the current user's passed-in user ID and then appends it to the endpoint.
      Returns:
      all transfers currently pending based on the current user's ID.
      Throws:
      org.springframework.web.client.RestClientResponseException - Throws an exception if RestClient cannot process the request due to an issue from the client.
      org.springframework.web.client.ResourceAccessException - Throws an exception if connection to the server is disturbed.

    • updateTransfer

      public void updateTransfer(AuthenticatedUser authenticatedUser, Transfer transfer)
      Deprecated.
      Not for use. Functionality not necessary for application type; no associated use case.
      This API uses the HttpEntity API to retrieve the token passed by the authenticatedUser object, then updates a transfer based on the passed-in transfer.
